name: Bathroom Manufacturers Association
membership:
CEIR, FECS, CPA. NHIC, CIPHE, SNIPEF, FMB
bathroom-association.org.uk
goal: The BMA is a trade association for bathroom manufacturers with the main aim to act as the voice of the industry on all matters impacting on manufacturers.  We provide a platform to discuss, debate and take action where necessary.  The Association ensures it is well placed to become the first point of call on all bathroom related issues for manufacturers, government, NGOs and members of the media.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: The Association follows with great interest in the field of; water and energy efficiency, product Standards, sustainability, circular economy, trade relation and agreements.
